$interpreted: Dylan: What's happened?!
Terrified Soldier: It's a disaster, Captain! There's a throng of monsters beyond the city walls! Sound every alarm!!
Naya: They've breached the palace already?!
Dylan: Mobilize everything we've got!
Dylan: I'll take care of this, Naya. You go ensure Her Highness's safety!
Naya: Affirmative!
Dylan: Palace Guard, you're with me! Move out!
Naya: Angelia! Angelia!
Naya: Angelia!
Hugo: You are confusing black with white, Queen Carlos. To distort the truth is evil.
Hugo: —Evil must be punished.
Angelia: Ngh...
Nolva: No!!!
Hugo: What are you doing? She is evil...
Nolva: I don't understand!!!
Nolva: Good, evil... I've never been able to understand you. But I don't sense that you're a bad person...
Hugo: ...Sense...
Nolva: Doesn't everyone have some kind of feeling for that? Please, stop, else you'll end up involving Kittyeyes and the others too...
Hugo: ...I don't.
Nolva: Huh?
Hugo: I don't. I don't have the kind of feeling that everyone else has.
Nolva: Hugo, you...
Naya: (Now—!)
Naya: Hey! You're no friend of Nolva's, and you're a damn crummy bodyguard!
Angelia: Naya! You're aiming... at Nolva?!
Naya: Make any move on Angelia, and we'll see just where this arrow embeds itself in her.
Naya: I know she's a good person. I was saved by her myself. But I won't hesitate to shoot her in the heart to protect my queen.
Angelia: Naya...
Hugo: (At such a close distance... It's hopeless...)
Naya: So, how about it?!
Hugo: Good and evil are absolute. Therefore...
Hugo: ...I don't understand, either. Whether it's you...
Hugo: ...Or you.
Nolva: Hugo...
Hugo: That's just how it is. I'm fed up with all of you.
Hugo: Now listen... The luck of the Carlos family has run out.
Hugo: The bell of judgment, the wrath of Sdorica, has sounded.
Hugo: It—has awakened.
Nolva: Wait, I have a message...!
Nolva: ...Please, beware of the curse.... The voice says... says...
Angelia: ...Curse?
Nolva: "All that is false shall not be forgiven. False legends, false nations, false powers."
Nolva: "As Queen, you shall shoulder the curse for them all."
Hugo: Let's go.
Nolva: ...That's what it says! Please—You have to watch out, Your Highness!
Angelia: What the...
Naya: It's not safe here, Angelia. We must leave at once!
Naya: We should be safe here for now.
Angelia: Naya, what was...
Wounded Kingdom Soldier: Urgh...
Angelia: He's seriously injured... Let me help you!
Angelia: What happened? The Soul Energy...
Naya: Watch out!
Angelia: I'll help you.
Angelia: But why...?!
Naya: Get back, Angelia! They're incoming!
Naya: Damn, what's bringing them here all of a sudden?
Angelia: (Could it be because...)
Naya: Phew... hoo... Are you okay, Angelia... He...
Angelia: He's... dead... I couldn't save him...
Naya: It's not your fault. He was mortally wounded.
Angelia: No, this is all my doing... False powers... This has to be the curse that Nolva mentioned.
Naya: What the hell are you saying, Angelia?!
Angelia: As long as I keep using the runes, I'll be attracting the monsters...

Model.Text: It's a disaster, Captain! There's a throng of monsters beyond the city walls! Sound every alarm!!
I'll take care of this, Naya. You go ensure Her Highness's safety!
Palace Guard, you're with me! Move out!

...I don't understand, either. Whether it's you...

Now listen... The luck of the Carlos family has run out.
The bell of judgment, the wrath of Sdorica, has sounded.
...Please, beware of the curse.... The voice says... says...
"All that is false shall not be forgiven. False legends, false nations, false powers."
"As Queen, you shall shoulder the curse for them all."

It's not safe here, Angelia. We must leave at once!
We should be safe here for now.

Damn, what's bringing them here all of a sudden?
Phew... hoo... Are you okay, Angelia... He...
He's... dead... I couldn't save him...
It's not your fault. He was mortally wounded.
No, this is all my doing... False powers... This has to be the curse that Nolva mentioned.
What the hell are you saying, Angelia?!
As long as I keep using the runes, I'll be attracting the monsters...
